scripts.deploy: git config --global user.name 'Soumasish' && git config --global user.email 'dasguptasoumasish@gmail.com' && git checkout main && rm -rf dist && cd ../ && cd ../ && cd part2/phonebook && npm install && npm run build && cp -r dist ../../part3/phonebook-backend && cd ../../part3/phonebook-backend && git add . && git commit -m 'uibuild' && git push
